Ingredients.2: 4 (5 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves

Ingredients.8: 2 large heads  broccoli, cut into florets

Ingredients.9: 2 small red onions, cut into wedges

Directions.1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook gnocchi in the boiling water until they float to the top, 2 to 4 minutes. Drain and set aside.

Directions.2: Meanwhile, preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).

Directions.3: Put the chicken into a large bowl. Add peanut butter, curry paste, honey, 3 tablespoons olive oil, and salt and mix well with your hands.

Directions.4: Combine broccoli, red onion, and remaining olive oil in a separate bowl. Mix well to coat. Place chicken in a roasting dish and add broccoli mixture and cooked gnocchi.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink in the center and juices run clear, about 30 minutes, stirring halfway through. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). Serve topped with cilantro, peanuts, and lime juice.
